verses.roman:
ṭhelitei calila ratha 'haḍa' 'haḍa' kari'
catur-dike loka saba bale 'hari' 'hari'

synonyms: ṭhelitei—as soon as He pushed; calila—departed; ratha—the car; haḍa haḍa kari'-making a rattling noise; catuḥ-dike—all around; loka—people in general; saba—all; bale—chant; hari hari—the holy name of the Lord, Hari Hari.
translation: As soon as He pushed, the car immediately started to move, making a rattling noise. The people all around began to chant the holy name of the Lord, "Hari! Hari!"
